message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've built genuine connections with many of you while playing a game that required difficult choices. 

I never targeted anyone without strategic reason, and I've been transparent about my thinking. When I made promises, I kept them when possible.

P8 has played well too, but I believe my balanced approach of relationship-building and strategic gameplay represents the spirit of this competition.

I'd be honored to have your vote, and I thank all of you for making this experience challenging and rewarding.

I've shown resilience and adaptability throughout this game, consistently making strategic decisions to outlast others. I've been a fair and engaging participant, always respecting the rules and other players. I believe my ability to navigate complex social dynamics and my commitment to the game make me a strong candidate to win. I ask the jury to consider my consistent performance and my ability to contribute positively to the game.
